name: 10,000 summer solstice sunrises: 12-KKK-Kruemmel-geesthacht
description:
10,000 summer solstice sunrises charts the alignment of the rising sun on the summer solstice every 10 years over the course of 10,000 years at key human infrastructural locations, such as power stations, nuclear waste dumps and server farms.

The first of the series plots this celestial axis (inspired by the solstice alignment of Stonehenge) across the 34 sites of nuclear power reactors in Germany.


12-KKK-Kruemmel-geesthacht: https://www.nuklearesicherheit.de/en/nuclear-facilities/nuclear-power-plants-in-germany/kruemmel-nuclear-power-plant-kkk/
